zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前雪崩币（AVAX/USD）价格为12.0649美元，近期波动幅度较小，显示出震荡整理的趋势。24小时变化为-0.58%，价格在12.1397和12.0397之间徘徊，表明市场尚未形成明确的方向。投资者需要关注后续的市场动向，以判断是否会出现突破。

技术指标方面，MACD值为-0.0311，显示出短期内的空头压力，但信号线数据缺失使得分析受到限制。SMA(20)为12.0958，当前价格略低于该均线，可能意味着短期内仍有回调压力。RSI数据缺乏，但如果RSI接近30，可能暗示超卖，从而为反弹提供机会。

支撑位方面，12.0397是关键支撑点，如果价格跌破，将可能加速下行。阻力位在12.1397，突破后有望进一步上涨。建议投资者在支撑位附近布局多单，同时设定止损以应对潜在的风险。如果价格突破阻力位，可以考虑加仓，追求更高的收益。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Avalanche (AVAX) is currently trading at $12.0649, showing a slight decline of 0.58% over the past 24 hours. This recent price action indicates a bearish sentiment, particularly as the cryptocurrency hovers near its recent low of $12.0397. The high of $12.1397 suggests a previous resistance level that traders may watch closely. Maintaining awareness of this range will be crucial for identifying potential breakout or breakdown points in the near term.

In terms of technical indicators, the absence of a current RSI value limits our ability to gauge momentum effectively. However, the MACD shows a negative value of -0.0311, indicating that bearish momentum may be prevailing. This aligns with the current price trend, suggesting that sellers may have the upper hand. Traders should remain cautious, as a continued decline could see AVAX testing lower support levels, potentially around the $11.80 mark.

The 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) stands at $12.0958, acting as a dynamic resistance level. This SMA can be used as a benchmark for short-term price movements; if AVAX can close above this level, it may indicate a shift toward bullish momentum. Conversely, if prices remain below this average, the bearish trend may continue, reinforcing the need to monitor the market closely for any signs of reversal.

For traders considering entry points, a cautious approach may be warranted. A break below the support level near $12 could signal further downside risk. Conversely, if AVAX manages to reclaim the $12.10 level and sustain above the 20-day SMA, it may present a buying opportunity with a target toward the recent high of $12.14. Overall, a careful assessment of price action and market sentiment will be crucial for making informed trading decisions in the current environment.
